title: HMO Solvency Act of 2000
content: Amends part C (MedicareChoice) of SSA title XVIII (Medicare) to establish solvency-related requirements for application to MedicareChoice organizations. Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to: (1) provide for the application of such requirements to organizations other than MedicareChoice organizations that receive payment on a capitated basis for provision of Medicare services. And (2) report to Congress on protection of health care providers in the event of insolvency.
